name: multi-window-management
title: Multi-Window Management
description: Manage Multiple windows and switch between them easily
author: mrjuna1d

commands.name: manage-groups
commands.title: Manage Window Groups
commands.description: View, create, edit, and delete window groups

commands.name: create-group
commands.title: Create Window Group
commands.description: Create a new window group from currently open windows

commands.name: switch-group
commands.title: Switch to Window Group
commands.description: Quickly switch to a saved window group

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
